test_strategy_covers_unit_integration_e2.notes: Strategy covers: unit tests (16 tests -- manifest validation + config schema), content validation tests (18 tests -- agent markdown protocol verification), integration tests (12 tests -- cross-component consistency). E2E/security/performance N/A (markdown protocol, no executable code paths). Documented justification for each excluded test type in test-strategy.md Section 3.6.

test_cases_exist_for_all_requirements.notes: 46 test cases covering all 7 FRs (FR-001 through FR-007), all 35 ACs (AC-001-01 through AC-007-04), all 4 NFRs (NFR-001 through NFR-004). 100% coverage verified by systematic AC-by-AC cross-check.

traceability_matrix_complete.notes: test-traceability-matrix.csv contains 72 rows mapping all 35 ACs and 4 NFRs to specific test cases. 0 orphan tests. All test cases trace back to at least one requirement.

coverage_targets_defined.notes: 100% AC coverage, 100% NFR coverage. 46 new test cases added to 555+ baseline. Coverage targets: 100% requirement mapping, 100% protocol section coverage, 100% cross-component consistency validation.

test_data_strategy_documented.notes: test-data-plan.md documents: state.json config variants (6 fixtures), skills manifest (real file), markdown files (5 source files), validation rules JSON, boundary values (test thresholds, agent counts), and regex patterns for content matching.

critical_paths_identified.notes: 4 critical paths identified: (1) skills manifest QL-012 registration, (2) --no-fan-out flag storage in state.json, (3) below-threshold backward compatibility, (4) merged output schema backward compatibility with gate-blocker. All have P0 test cases.

article_ii_test_first.notes: All 46 tests designed in Phase 05 before implementation (Phase 06). Test strategy, cases, and traceability matrix complete before any code changes.

article_vii_traceability.notes: 100% requirement coverage: all 35 ACs mapped to test cases in test-traceability-matrix.csv. All 4 NFRs covered. 0 orphan tests (every test traces to a requirement).

article_ix_quality_gate.notes: All GATE-05 checklist items verified. Required artifacts created: test-strategy.md, test-cases.md, test-traceability-matrix.csv, test-data-plan.md.

article_xi_integration_testing.notes: 12 integration tests validate cross-component interactions: agent-to-manifest consistency, threshold value alignment between spec and implementation, strategy differentiation between phases, flag parsing in isdlc.md, validation rules completeness, observability schema consistency.
